*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Province of Tais*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-17-1826">April 17th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p* Dear Sir I have the pleasure of writing these lines to you to inform you of my situation that is I am at this and have been very sick I was taken at *location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="04-09-1826">eight days since*/date_mentioned* and have remained sick ever since and I can further [tell?] you that cotton is very low and I have declined going to *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*and cant tell when I shall return on account of getting return for my cotton and I have wrote to my *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*which will be lodged with you and I want you to forward the letter to her as [soon as] possible and oblige your friend nothing more but remains yours with respect*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Jesse Thompson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austins colony*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Brasses*/location_mentioned**/p*
